page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: CINEMA.In Worcester we have one cinema.The cinema has three screens.Nearly half the children in our class (14) visit quite often.It shows three films at any one time sho three screens.Nearly half the children (14) visit quite regularly.It shows three films at any one time. AT HOME.At home we have a colour television.We have four channels to choose from.We also have videos to record programmes if you are out in town,shopping or visiting anyone. Computers are good fun and there is a wide variety of games to play.Cassette recorders and record players bring enjoyment through listening. OUTDOORS.Many people enjoy circuses which visit the town each year.Parks provide leisure for young and old alike.
